data.Disc: Work in office. Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role. Portfolio of design projects. Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop or Figma or Adobe Xd.n
Senior UX / UI Designer with more than 12 years of experience in User Interface Design and User Experience Design
Should have strong experience in User Research, User-Centered Design, Wireframes, Rapid Prototyping preferably for a product
Working exposure to Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator, In Vision Studio, HTML5, CSS3, Dreamweaver
Need to Collaborate with product management, customers, UI developers, and QA to deliver intuitive user experiences
Windows, Mac, and Linux are all supported
